Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.SceneController
public class SceneController
extends java.lang.Object
SceneController handled the switch to other scene and the modifies of current scene nodes.

  • Method Details

    • isCurrentScene

      public static boolean isCurrentScene​(java.lang.String selector)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one of chosen scene node
      Returns:
      if is the right scene. this method try to lookup @param selector and return if is the right scene.

    • setScene

      public static void setScene​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String fxml) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      stage - is current stage.
      fxml - identifies fxml files for new scene.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if fxml loading file fails.

    • changeRootPane

      public static void changeRootPane​(java.lang.String fxml)
      Parameters:
      fxml - identifies fxml files for new scene. switch to a new scene.

    • changeRootPane

      public static void changeRootPane​(OpponentPlayerboardSceneController opsc, java.lang.String fxml)
      Parameters:
      opsc - is one OpponentPlayerboardSceneController.
      fxml - identifies fxml files for new scene. switch to a new scene.

    • setVisible

      public static void setVisible​(java.lang.String selector, boolean visible)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      visible - refers to if @param selector is visible or not. set @param selector to visible or invisible due to @param visible.

    • setDisable

      public static void setDisable​(java.lang.String selector, boolean disable)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      disable - refers to if @param selector is visible or not. set @param selector to disable or enable due to @param visible.

    • setText

      public static void setText​(java.lang.String selector, java.lang.String text)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      text - is the text which is going to be set to @param selector.

    • clearText

      public static void clearText​(java.lang.String selector)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node. clear @param selector text.

    • setImage

      public static void setImage​(java.lang.String selector, java.lang.String file)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      file - refers to file image. if @param file equals "" set @param selector to null, otherwise set to the selected image.

    • setLayoutX

      public static void setLayoutX​(java.lang.String selector, int x)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      x - is the x coordinate which is going to be set @param selector.

    • setLayoutY

      public static void setLayoutY​(java.lang.String selector, int y)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      y - is the y coordinate which is going to be set @param selector.

    • setOpacity

      public static void setOpacity​(java.lang.String selector, int opacity)
      Parameters:
      selector - is one scene node.
      opacity - refers to @param selector opacity. set @param selector opacity.

    • addMessage

      public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Parameters:
      message - is one message received from Server. add @param message to YourTurnSceneController messages ScrollPane.

    • errorMessage

      public static void errorMessage​(java.lang.String error)
      Parameters:
      error - is one error message received from Server. display @param error to YourTurnSceneController errorPane.
